DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , Single Dose Pharmacokinetic Study Benefix ( Recombinant Factor IX ) Male Chinese Subjects With Hemophilia B
DOC.criteria: Male Chinese subject 6 year old ( weight ≥20kg ) moderate severe hemophilia B ( Factor IX activity ≤2 % ) . Subjects receive infusion Factor IX product least 4 day administration BeneFIX Day 1 . Subjects must nonbleeding state administration BeneFIX Day 1 . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) disease clinical finding Screening . Diagnosed bleed disorder addition hemophilia B . Current FIX inhibitor history FIX inhibitor ( define > Upper Limit Normal ( ULN ) report lab ) .
